[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@boba-cli/spinner](./spinner.md) &gt; [SpinnerModel](./spinner.spinnermodel.md)

## SpinnerModel class

Spinner component model.

Use `tick()` to start the animation, then handle `TickMsg` in your update function by calling `model.update(msg)`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class SpinnerModel 
```

Command to start/continue the spinner animation. Call this in your model's init() or after handling a TickMsg.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

</td><td>


</td><td>
